comments.author: bugzilla@botmanfamily.net
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.0.6) Gecko/20060728 Firefox/1.5.0.6 Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.0.6) Gecko/20060728 Firefox/1.5.0.6 If a foo tag is present inside a 
 zone, it will not be printed.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Write a Perl script:
#!/usr/bin/perl
print "Content-type: text/html\n\n";
print "
title: one
two
no title: three
";
exit;

2. Expected result: 
title: one
two
no title: three

3. Actual result:
title: one
[blank line]
no title: three
comments.text:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.0.6) Gecko/20060728 Firefox/1.5.0.6 Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.0.6) Gecko/20060728 Firefox/1.5.0.6 If a foo tag is present inside a 
 zone, it will not be printed.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Write a Perl script:
#!/usr/bin/perl
print "Content-type: text/html\n\n";
print "
title: one
two
no title: three
";
exit;

2. Expected result: 
title: one
two
no title: three

3. Actual result:
title: one
[blank line]
no title: three
comments.creator: bugzilla@botmanfamily.net
polidobj@yahoo.com
comments.raw_text: Using the title element outside of the head is invalid HTML.  There is a blank line because that title is moved to the head.  If you wish to display HTML code in a pre element then you need to use entities.
comments.text: Using the title element outside of the head is invalid HTML.  There is a blank line because that title is moved to the head.  If you wish to display HTML code in a pre element then you need to use entities.
comments.author: polidobj@yahoo.com
